description:
Devoted to helping you recover the full amount of compensation you deserve after suffering an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence, the attorneys at the law office of Hardy Wolf & Downing in Portland, Maine, are here to assert your rights, protect your entitlements and help you achieve the most favorable outcome possible for your serious personal injury or wrongful death claim.

Established in 1976, the law firm has served the needs of innocent accident victims and their families throughout the greater Portland metro region as well as Lewiston and all across the state. During that time, they have recovered more than $200 million for their plaintiff clients, earning their reputation as one of the top injury practices in the region.

Whether your claim is the result of a motor vehicle accident caused by someone else, a construction accident, a slip-and-fall accident or any other type of preventable tragedy, you can rely on the law firm's attorneys' decades of combined legal experience to help you obtain the justice you seek. Personable and responsive, they will work directly with you throughout all legal proceedings while remaining accessible to address your questions and concerns as they arise.

You do not have to face your legal challenge alone. By reaching out to Hardy Wolf & Downing and taking advantage of their law firm's free initial consultation, you can discover how they can best help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family. Working on a contingency basis, they will never require a fee unless they win your case.
